references.paper_title: FlowFormer: A transformer architecture for optical flow
references.reason: This paper proposes FlowFormer, a novel transformer-based architecture for optical flow estimation, which is directly used as a pre-trained model in the current work for motion feature extraction.

references.paper_title: RAFT: Recurrent all-pairs field transforms for optical flow
references.reason: RAFT is another pre-trained optical flow estimator used in this work, and its bidirectional flows are leveraged as input for motion modeling.

references.paper_title: AMT: All-pairs multi-field transforms for efficient frame interpolation
references.reason: The frame synthesis module in this paper is adapted from AMT, which is among the state-of-the-art flow-based frame interpolation methods.
The Vimeo90K dataset used for training in this paper is introduced in this publication.

references.paper_title: Super SloMo: High quality estimation of multiple intermediate frames for video interpolation
references.reason: This paper is cited as one of the early approaches to flow-based video frame interpolation, which motivates the current work to improve motion modeling for better interpolation results.
